description: I. Letter dated 27/01/2009 from Peter Wardle, Chief Executive of the Electoral Commission, to Peter Viggers MP regarding the Electoral Commission's future enforcement policy. 3 p. II. Letter from Peter Viggers MP to Laura Sourke, House of Lords Library, regarding the deposit of the above letter. 1 p. III. Investigation and enforcement : the Electoral Commission's proposed approach [draft policy and guidance document]. 33 p.
